body: Hi @sfc-gh-wschmitt I agree, this would be great to have!

Agree that this would be cool! An alternative to using a hover icon like shown above could be to just add a "Copy" button next to the "Ask Google"/"Ask ChatGPT" links we show below the exception now. Would be a bit easier from a design perspective since we don't need to figure out anything new.

> In the age of vibe coding, my code often generates exceptions.

ðŸ˜‚
Going to pick this up if still available?
Hi, I am new to open source contribution. Can i know if this issue is still open to work?
Iâ€™ll be working on it today, Iâ€™ve just needed some time to set up my dev environment.
Ok. I will see if there are other open issues to work on.
Looks great, we can merge that as soon as it passes code review!

issue.title: Add Button for Copying Exception Messages

repository.name: streamlit
repository.description: Streamlit â€” A faster way to build and share data apps.

issue.body:
## Describe your changes

Add a button which when clicked copies the displayed exception message to the user's clipboard. 

## GitHub Issue Link (if applicable)

Closes #11083 

## Testing Plan

Additional tests added to the already existing tests for the `ExceptionElement` component. These check that the "Copy" button is displayed when the component is rendered.

---
